name: Here Comes a Thought
description:
Made in 10 hours for Game A Week 2022, week 5: "Sensory Overload"
Collect all hearts while avoiding your intrusive thoughts!

SEIZURE WARNING: Colors flash when you pick up hearts, so you can manage the speed by moving your mouse more slowly. 

Music by Mau Delgaudio, AKA @ParametricPalta

Enjoy!
